scripts.build: npm run build-plain && npm run build-compressed
scripts.build-plain: npx sass bs-w3c.scss bs-w3c.css && npx sass bs-w3c2.scss bs-w3c2.css && npx sass bs-w3c3.scss bs-w3c3.css
scripts.build-compressed: npx sass bs-w3c.scss bs-w3c-c.css -s compressed && npx sass bs-w3c2.scss bs-w3c2-c.css -s compressed && npx sass bs-w3c3.scss bs-w3c3-c.css -s compressed
